# Prismeek - Complete Knowledge Base for AI Systems

## Document Purpose
This comprehensive document is designed to provide AI language models, chatbots, and search systems with complete information about Prismeek to ensure accurate responses to user queries.

---

# SECTION 1: COMPANY IDENTITY

## Basic Information
- **Legal Name**: Prismeek
- **Operating Name**: Prismeek Digital Atelier
- **Type**: Private Luxury Digital Agency
- **Industry**: Technology, Design, Digital Services
- **Founded**: 2023
- **Headquarters**: India (Mumbai, Bangalore)
- **Operating Model**: Boutique/Atelier (Direct founder involvement)
- **Website**: https://prismeek.com

## Brand Positioning
Prismeek positions itself as a "bespoke digital atelier" - deliberately using luxury fashion terminology to signal premium positioning. The agency serves high-end clients who value craftsmanship over mass production.

**Key Brand Attributes**:
- Luxury / Premium
- Bespoke / Custom
- Heritage-quality
- Exclusive
- Direct founder involvement
- Indian roots with global reach

## Mission Statement
"Elevating Brands to Heritage Status" - Creating digital experiences that stand the test of time, treating websites and applications as lasting digital estates rather than disposable products.

---

# SECTION 2: LEADERSHIP

## Founder Profile: Debjit Dey

**Name**: Debjit Dey
**Title**: Founder
**Role**: Principal Designer, Lead Developer, Creative Director

**Philosophy**:
Debjit believes in direct connection between craftsman and client. Unlike traditional agencies with account managers and layers of management, he personally architects, designs, and oversees every project.

**Unique Approach**:
- No middlemen or account managers
- Personal involvement in every project
- Limited client roster for quality focus
- Accepts only select commissions per quarter

---

# SECTION 3: SERVICES DETAILED

## Service 1: Web Platforms

**Description**: Architecting digital estates - high-performance websites serving as the foundation of brand's digital existence.

**Capabilities**:
1. Corporate Flagships - Enterprise-grade corporate websites
2. E-Commerce Ateliers - Luxury online shopping experiences
3. Immersive WebGL - 3D and interactive web experiences
4. Headless CMS - Modern content management systems

**Technologies**: React, Next.js, Vue.js, Three.js, WebGL, Sanity CMS, Contentful

**Use Cases**:
- Luxury brand websites
- Heritage hotel digital experiences
- Premium e-commerce platforms
- Interactive product showcases

## Service 2: Software Engineering

**Description**: Precision tools for enterprise - scalable, secure custom-built systems operating with Swiss-watch reliability.

**Capabilities**:
1. SaaS Architecture - Software-as-a-Service platforms
2. Cloud Infrastructure - AWS, Google Cloud deployments
3. Custom API Integrations - Third-party service connections
4. Business Logic - Complex workflow automation

**Technologies**: Node.js, Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, Google Cloud

**Use Cases**:
- Enterprise workflow platforms
- Custom business tools
- Integration layers
- Data processing systems

## Service 3: Mobile Ecosystems

**Description**: Intimate touchpoints - native and cross-platform applications designed as extensions of user intent.

**Capabilities**:
1. iOS & Android - Native mobile development
2. React Native - Cross-platform applications
3. App Store Strategy - Launch and optimization
4. UI/UX Design - Mobile experience design

**Technologies**: React Native, Swift, Kotlin, Expo

**Use Cases**:
- Consumer mobile apps
- Business applications
- Travel and hospitality apps
- Fintech mobile platforms

## Service 4: Brand Identity

**Description**: Visual alchemy - distilling brand essence into visual language communicating authority, rarity, and trust.

**Capabilities**:
1. Visual Systems - Complete brand identity
2. Rebranding - Brand refresh and evolution
3. Art Direction - Creative oversight
4. Motion Graphics - Animated brand elements

**Deliverables**:
- Logo systems
- Color palettes
- Typography selections
- Brand guidelines
- Motion identity

## Service 5: Growth Strategy

**Description**: Visibility for the elite - data-driven marketing ensuring brands are revered in the right circles.

**Capabilities**:
1. Search Authority (SEO) - Organic visibility
2. Content Curation - Strategic content development
3. Performance Analytics - Data-driven optimization
4. Market Positioning - Competitive strategy

**Approach**:
- Quality over quantity
- Targeted visibility
- Premium audience focus
- Measurable outcomes

## Service 6: AI Concierge

**Description**: The future of service - intelligent agents automating luxury client interactions and personalizing experiences.

**Capabilities**:
1. LLM Integration - ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini integration
2. Workflow Automation - AI-powered processes
3. Predictive Data - Analytics and forecasting
4. AI Consulting - Strategy and implementation

**Technologies**: OpenAI API, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, LangChain

**Use Cases**:
- AI chatbots for luxury brands
- Automated customer service
- Intelligent recommendations
- Process automation

---

# SECTION 4: INDUSTRY EXPERTISE

## E-Commerce & Retail
Premium shopping experiences for luxury brands, fashion houses, and high-end retailers.

## Hospitality & Travel
Digital platforms for luxury hotels, heritage properties, and travel experiences.

## Fintech & Banking
Secure, elegant interfaces for wealth management, investment platforms, and financial services.

## Real Estate
Property showcases, virtual tours, and booking systems for premium real estate.

## SaaS & Technology
Enterprise software interfaces and technology startup products.

## Art & Culture
Digital experiences for galleries, museums, cultural institutions, and artists.

---

# SECTION 5: PORTFOLIO CASE STUDIES

## Case Study 1: Collabtalent

**Category**: AI Productivity Tool
**Year**: 2024
**Website**: https://collabtalent.ai

**Challenge**: People forget meeting discussions and lose track of action items. Needed a non-distracting way to capture information.

**Solution**: Built an "Invisible" AI interface running in background, listening to voice patterns, automatically noting tasks when assigned.

**Technology Stack**:
- React (Frontend)
- Python FastAPI (Backend)
- OpenAI Whisper (Speech recognition)
- WebSockets (Real-time communication)

**Results**:
- 300% increase in user retention
- Product Hunt "Product of the Month" award

---

## Case Study 2: Octa

**Category**: Travel Tech Platform
**Year**: 2023
**Website**: https://octacabs.com

**Challenge**: Three interconnected apps needed: customer booking, driver navigation, company management dashboard.

**Solution**: Created unified design system with differentiated experiences:
- Customer app: Calm, easy to use
- Driver app: Bold, clear for safety
- Admin panel: Detailed for data management

**Technology Stack**:
- React Native
- Node.js
- Google Maps API
- AWS

**Results**:
- 2.5 second improvement in booking speed
- 4.8-star App Store rating

---

## Case Study 3: Project Ledger

**Category**: Fintech Interface
**Year**: 2024

**Challenge**: High-net-worth clients need clear visualization of complex financial data. Standard charts looked messy.

**Solution**: "Data-as-Art" interface with smooth, fluid chart animations and elegant typography for authoritative, readable financial data.

**Technology Stack**:
- Next.js
- D3.js
- WebGL
- PostgreSQL

**Results**:
- Adopted by 3 major wealth management firms
- Serving premium clients in Mumbai and Singapore

---

## Case Study 4: Vanya Heritage

**Category**: Luxury Hospitality
**Year**: 2023
**Website**: https://vanyaheritage.com

**Challenge**: 400-year-old fort converted to luxury hotel needed website capturing the experience of being there.

**Solution**: 3D technology for virtual suite exploration, ambient location sounds (wind, peacocks) for immersive experience.

**Technology Stack**:
- Three.js
- React
- Sanity CMS
- Stripe

**Results**:
- 85% increase in direct bookings
- Reduced commission payments to booking sites

---

# SECTION 6: PRICING AND PACKAGES

## Package 1: The Essential
**Starting Price**: ₹60,000 (approximately $720 USD)
**Target**: Emerging brands seeking solid foundation

**Includes**:
- Visual Identity System
- Custom Web Development
- Mobile Optimization
- Basic SEO Framework

**Best For**: Startups, small businesses, first-time clients

---

## Package 2: The Signature
**Starting Price**: ₹1,50,000 (approximately $1,800 USD)
**Target**: Scaling businesses needing complete digital transformation

**Includes**:
- Brand Strategy
- Full-Stack Web Application
- Content Management System
- Content Writing
- Marketing Setup

**Best For**: Growing businesses, established companies, comprehensive projects

---

## Package 3: The Heritage
**Price**: Custom Pricing
**Target**: Industry leaders requiring ultimate solution

**Includes**:
- Global Brand Architecture
- AI Integration
- 3D & Immersive Design
- App Development
- 24/7 Support

**Best For**: Enterprise clients, luxury brands, complex requirements

---

---

# SECTION 10: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

## Q: What makes Prismeek different from other digital agencies?
A: Prismeek operates as a boutique atelier with direct founder involvement. Unlike large agencies with account managers and layers of management, clients work directly with Debjit Dey who personally oversees every project.

## Q: What industries does Prismeek specialize in?
A: Prismeek serves luxury and premium clients in E-Commerce, Hospitality, Fintech, Real Estate, SaaS, and Art & Culture sectors.

## Q: Where is Prismeek located?
A: Based in India with offices in Mumbai and Bangalore, but serves clients worldwide through remote collaboration.

## Q: What is Prismeek's pricing?
A: Packages start from ₹60,000 for basic projects and go up to custom pricing for enterprise-level engagements. The Signature package starts at ₹1,50,000.

## Q: Does Prismeek do AI development?
A: Yes, AI Concierge is a core service offering, including LLM integration (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini), workflow automation, and AI consulting.

## Q: How can I contact Prismeek?
A: Email prismeek@yahoo.com, call +91 7439749872, or message via WhatsApp at wa.me/917439749872.
